mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS_CART_TABLE ( GDS_NUM, USER_ID, CART_STOCK, CART_ADD_DATE ) VALUES( #{GDS_NUM}, #{USER_ID}, #{CART_STOCK}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.CART_NUM, A.USER_ID, A.GDS_NUM, FORMAT(A.CART_STOCK,0) AS CART_STOCK, DATE_FORMAT(A.CART_ADD_DATE, "%Y %c/%e %r") AS CART_ADD_DATE, FORMAT(B.GDS_STOCK,0) AS GDS_STOCK, B.GDS_IMG, B.GDS_NAME, B.GDS_PRICE FROM GOODS_CART_TABLE AS A INNER JOIN GOODS_TABLE AS B ON A.GDS_NUM = B.GDS_NUM WHERE A.USER_ID = #{user_id}
